org.jboss.aerogear.android.pipe.loader

Class LoaderAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.aerogear.android.pipe.loader.LoaderAdapter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.app.LoaderManager.LoaderCallbacks<HeaderAndBody>, LoaderPipe<T>, Pipe<T>

    public class LoaderAdapter<T>
extends Object
implements LoaderPipe<T>, android.app.LoaderManager.LoaderCallbacks<HeaderAndBody>
    This class wraps a Pipe in an asynchronous Loader.
